Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood & 75th due to street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood, then resume their normal route on 75th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.
